org.streaminer.stream.model

Interface Distribution<T extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The generic type of elements covered by this distribution.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NominalDistributionModel, NumericalDistributionModel, StreamDistribution

    public interface Distribution<T extends Serializable>

    This is the root interface for all kinds of distributions. The methods defined need to be provided for nominal or numerical distribution implementations.

    Author:
    Christian Bockermann <chris@jwall.org>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Integer getCount()
      Returns the total number of all observations incorporated into this model.

      Returns the number of observations that equal the given value.

      Computes the empirical probability of the given value, i.e.
      void update(T item)
      This method is called to incorporate a new observation into the distribution model.
